comments.body: This no longer accepts `VMWARE_TEST_PLATFORM=''`. The var be unset or set to worldstream or govcsim.  This is probably fine, just want to note the change.
Yes, this is done on purpose.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +53,57 @@        # if no other config if provided.
        self.vmware_test_platform = os.environ.get('VMWARE_TEST_PLATFORM', 'govcsim')
        self.aci = None
        self.insecure = False
        self.proxy = None
